answer: At Life2Home we bring you complete interior designing turnkey solutions to you, we offer standard modular furniture designing services as well as consultancy and take care of the execution to give you your completed dream home.
name: What are the services offered by Life2Home?
question: What are the services offered by Life2Home?

answer: To start with, we are putting forth our expertise in modular furniture and modular kitchens, we offer assistance during other scope of work involved, while also providing you management services for them, i.e, we provide you vendors from our preferred team for various scope of work such as false ceiling, electrical work etc., you are to pay the vendors directly for their labor and material resources while we do the supervision of execution until your project is completed and handed over to you.
name: What is Life2Home’s field of work?
question: What is Life2Home’s field of work?

answer: Yes, you will be shown and explained 10-12 standard pre-designed modules, you choose and finalize one which shall be taken up for execution.
name: Can I choose my own designs?
question: Can I choose my own designs?

answer: Yes, you have an option of doing so, we can also give you inputs/suggestions regarding those.
name: Can I mix and match designs by using elements from different standard designs?
question: Can I mix and match designs by using elements from different standard designs?

name: What will be the execution period after finalization of designs?
question: What will be the execution period after finalization of designs?

answer: Life2Home delivers services PAN India, whilst being operational from Pune.
name: What cities does Life2Home operate in?
question: What cities does Life2Home operate in?

answer: We recommend you to visit our office first and understand our concept, and work process before you finalize Life2Home for designing your house. The registration process starts after your approval and visit to Life2Home’s office.
name: Can we get registered before visiting Life2Home office?
question: Can we get registered before visiting Life2Home office?

answer: Yes, you will be assigned a specific executive to your project who would be available for any assistance required during the project timeline.
name: Will I have a specific person assigned to my project?
question: Will I have a specific person assigned to my project?

answer: The only changes/adjustments made will be with regard to dimensions, colours and placement, other than that, customizations will not be offered. For customizations regarding interior design, we advise you to choose the KAM’s Designer Zone and it’s services.
name: What changes can I propose in the designs that I select for execution?
question: What changes can I propose in the designs that I select for execution?

answer: For those seeking uniqueness and personalization, our bespoke services curated by LIFE2HOME are at your disposal. With us, you'll not only receive assistance during execution but also enjoy after-service support for a remarkable 2 years from the project's completion.
name: What if we want customized designs according to our preferences?
question: What if we want customized designs according to our preferences?
